resources.string:
Welcome to SPLITS

Quick Start

1. Select Preferences from the upper right hand corner dropdown menu. Select either Swim Meet or Track Meet. Swim Meet is the default.

2. Open the SPLITS navigation drawer by swiping the screen from left edge to right or tapping the SPLITS stopwatch icon on the action bar.

3. Navigate to the Athletes screen and add the athletes you want to time.

4. Navigate to the Meets screen and add meet title(s).

5. Navigate to the Individual Races or Relay Races screen. Select the meet, event, and athletes to time from their respective dropdown button lists. Press the Start button to begin the race; the Split button to record race splits; and the Stop button to end the race.

6. After the race is finished, press either the Checkmark in the action bar or your device’s Back Button to prepare for next race.

7. Help is available from the upper right hand corner dropdown menu.

Help: Individual Races

1. Select the meet, event, and athletes to time from their respective dropdown button lists.

2. One or two athletes may be timed in any individual race event.

3. Press a Start button to begin the race; the Split button to record race splits; and the Stop button to end the race.

4. To add additional meet, event, or athletes long press its dropdown button or select the applicable screen from the navigation drawer.

5. After race is finished press either the Checkmark in the action bar or your device’s Back Button to prepare for next race.

Help: Relay Races

1. Select the meet, event, and athletes to time from their respective dropdown button lists.

2. Press the Start button to begin the relay race; the Split button to record relay splits; and the Stop button to end the relay.

3. To add additional meet, event, or athletes long press its dropdown button or select the applicable screen from the navigation drawer.

4. After race is finished, press either the Checkmark in the action bar or your device’s Back Button to prepare for next relay race.

Help: Best Times

1. Select an athlete from the dropdown button list.

2. Select Individual Event or Relay.

3. Press on an event to see race splits.

4. Email times from the upper right hand corner dropdown menu.

Help: All Races

1. Select an athlete from the dropdown button list.

2. Select Individual Event or Relay.

3. Press on an event to see race splits.

4. Email times from the upper right hand corner dropdown menu.

Help: Race and Relay Splits

1. Press edit icon to correct or set official race time.

2. Press delete icon to delete race.

3. Email times from the upper right hand corner dropdown menu.

Help: Athletes

1. Press the Add Person icon to add athletes from your contacts.

2. Press theAdd icon to enter an athlete’s name not in contacts.

3. Checked athletes are shown in dropdown button lists; unchecked athletes are hidden from dropdown button lists.

4. Long press on an athlete to edit or delete an athlete’s name. It is not recommended to delete athletes; rather uncheck them instead. Note: When revising an athlete’s name, no changes are made in your device’s contacts.

5. Press on an athlete’s image to show the athlete’s contact information.

Help: Meets

1. Type the meet title then press Add Meet button.

2. Checked meets are shown in dropdown button lists; unchecked meets are hidden from dropdown button lists.

3. Long press on a meet to edit or delete the meet. It is not recommended to delete meets; rather uncheck them instead.

Help: Events

1. This screen is pre-populated with common swim and track meet events.

2. Checked events are shown in dropdown button lists; unchecked events are hidden from dropdown button lists.

3. Long press on an event to edit or delete the event. It is not recommended to delete events; rather uncheck them instead.

4. Pressing the + icon checks all events. Pressing the - icon unchecks all events.

Help: Create Events

1. Fill in all required data.

2. Press the Create Event button.

Help: FAQ

1. How do I add athletes? Navigate to the Athletes screen via the navigation drawer or by long pressing on one of the athlete dropdown buttons. Then press either the Add Person icon to add athletes from your contacts or press Add icon to enter an athlete’s name that is not in your contacts.

Note: if you use the Add icon you will be given the choice to add the athlete to your contacts. Other than that SPLITS makes no changes to your contact’s information.

2. Can I add an event if it was not included in the pre-populated list? Yes. Navigate to the Create Events screen via the navigation drawer. Fill in the required information and then press the Create Event button.

3. There are several pre-populated events that I’ll never use. Is there a way to hide them so they are not visible in the dropdown button lists? Yes. Navigate to the Events screen and uncheck all the events that you want to hide. You can also hide athletes and meets is a similar manner.

4. How do I delete or edit athletes, meets, and events? Navigate to the applicable screen, then long press on the item that you want to edit or delete.

Note: it is not recommended to delete these items, rather uncheck them so they are not displayed in the dropdown button lists.

5. What do I do if I’ve started a race and there is a false start? While the race is running, press either the Checkmark in the action bar or your device’s Back Button. This will stop the race and nothing will be saved.

If you have already pressed the stop button, navigate to a Results screen and press the race you want to delete. This opens the race’s Splits screen. From there you can delete the race.

6. Can I adjust a race’s final time? Yes. Navigate to a Results screen and press on a race to open its Splits screen. From there you can delete the race or edit its time. Editing a race’s time also adjusts each of its splits.
